snippet: The Pentagon and Congress are working on policies to separate at-risk service members from personal weapons, but gun-rights advocates and many veterans are opposed.
abstract: Pentagon and Congress, noting that nearly half of all military suicides are committed with privately owned firearms, are moving to establish policies intended to separate at-risk service members from their personal weapons; gun-rights advocates and many veterans are opposed.
lead_paragraph: The Pentagon and Congress are working on policies to separate at-risk service members from personal weapons, but gun-rights advocates and many veterans are opposed.

headline.seo: With Military Suicides Rising, a Focus on Private Weapons
headline.main: As Military Suicides Rise, Focus Is on Private Weapons
headline.print_headline: Pentagon Maneuvers To Counter Suicide Rise

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
